channel.title: webdev on AJDIN
channel.description: Recent content in webdev on AJDIN

item.title: Connecting and using PostgreSQL to a NodeJS app
item.description: Quick intro This is a short blog post on how to connect Postgres to a NodeJS app. This isn’t that hard to do but I figured I might as well write it down as I’m going to be doing this a lot in the future.

item.title: Building Worklog: a PERN stack web application
item.description: Introduction I’ll be building a simple web application to log workers’ activity. I’ll be using PostgresSQL for database, React for front end and Express for routing the app.
